[{"id":"199","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"D\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 v\u1eadn t\u1ea3i th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi","tenbaiviet_en":"World transport service","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"<p><br \/>\r\nC&ocirc;ng ty cung c\u1ea5p cho kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng gi\u1ea3i ph&aacute;p v\u1eadn t\u1ea3i v&agrave; logistics t\u1ed5ng h\u1ee3p, s&aacute;ng t\u1ea1o v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 tr&aacute;ch nhi\u1ec7m t\u1eeb vi\u1ec7c s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n an to&agrave;n cho t\u1eebng ki\u1ec7n h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ebfn d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 h\u1eadu c\u1ea7n kh&aacute;c nh\u01b0 \u0111&oacute;ng g&oacute;i, l\u01b0u kho, ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>C&ocirc;ng ty thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 theo \u0111&uacute;ng y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a t\u1eebng kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m \u0111\u1eb7c th&ugrave; c\u1ee7a m\u1ed7i kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng. Song song v\u1edbi \u0111&oacute;, \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cung c\u1ea5p \u0111&uacute;ng nh\u01b0 \u0111&atilde; cam k\u1ebft v\u1edbi kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, C&ocirc;ng ty thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp quy tr&igrave;nh l&agrave;m vi\u1ec7c (Standard Operating Procedure &ndash; SOP) v\u1edbi m\u1ed7i kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3 h&oacute;a t\u1eebng b\u01b0\u1edbc c&ocirc;ng vi\u1ec7c v&agrave; th\u1eddi gian hai b&ecirc;n c\u1ea7n th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n.<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<\/p>","mota_en":"<p>The company provides customers with integrated, creative transportation and logistics solutions with full responsibility from arranging safe transportation for each package to other logistics services such as packaging, storage, and distribution.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>The company designs services according to each customer&#39;s requirements, suitable for each customer&#39;s specific products. At the same time, to ensure that services are provided as committed to customers, the Company establishes a working process (Standard Operating Procedure - SOP) with each customer, specifying each step of work and the time both sides need to implement.<\/p>","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p><br \/>\r\nKh&ocirc;ng ch\u1ec9 d\u1eebng l\u1ea1i \u1edf vi\u1ec7c cung c\u1ea5p d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n, giao nh\u1eadn, ki\u1ec3m \u0111\u1ebfm c&aacute;c th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c nh&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t l\u1edbn, C&ocirc;ng ty c&ograve;n k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i, m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c v\u1edbi c&aacute;c nh&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t n&agrave;y trong vi\u1ec7c cung c\u1ea5p d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 khai thu&ecirc; h\u1ea3i quan v&agrave; v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u \u0111\u1ea7u v&agrave;o cho h\u1ecd. C&ocirc;ng ty s\u1edf h\u1eefu \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 xe t\u1ea3i nh\u1ecf hung m\u1ea1nh v\u1edbi t\u1ea3i tr\u1ecdng t\u1eeb 0,5 t\u1ea5n, 1,25 t\u1ea5n, 2,3 t\u1ea5n, 5 t\u1ea5n, 8 t\u1ea5n, 10 t\u1ea5n v&agrave; \u0111\u1ebfn 15 t\u1ea5n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph&eacute;p ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng tr&ecirc;n t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c tuy\u1ebfn ph\u1ed1 t\u1ea1i b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m n&agrave;o trong ng&agrave;y (k\u1ec3 c\u1ea3 gi\u1edd cao \u0111i\u1ec3m) \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n t\u1ed1t c&aacute;c h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i to&agrave;n qu\u1ed1c.<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>Not only does it stop at providing transportation, delivery, and counting services for finished products of large manufacturers, the Company also connects and expands cooperation with these manufacturers in providing services. clear customs and transport input materials for them. The company owns a strong fleet of small trucks with capacities ranging from 0.5 tons, 1.25 tons, 2.3 tons, 5 tons, 8 tons, 10 tons and up to 15 tons that are allowed to operate on all routes. streets at any time of the day (including rush hours) to ensure good implementation of nationwide distribution contracts.<\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"dich-vu-van-tai-quoc-te-cp-801771718692755","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"5","icon":"images\/dtn\/9.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1718606493","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"13","step":"2","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4 V\u1eacN T\u1ea2I QU\u1ed0C T\u1ebe","seo_title_en":"World transport service","seo_title_cn":"","seo_keywords_vi":"D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4 V\u1eacN T\u1ea2I QU\u1ed0C T\u1ebe","seo_keywords_en":"World transport service","seo_keywords_cn":"","seo_description_vi":"D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4 V\u1eacN T\u1ea2I QU\u1ed0C T\u1ebe","seo_description_en":"World transport service","seo_description_cn":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"1","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","gia_tri_1_vi":"","gia_tri_2_vi":"","gia_tri_3_vi":""},{"id":"200","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"D\u1ecbch vu khai thu\u1ebf h\u1ea3i quan","tenbaiviet_en":"Customs tax declaration service","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"<p>C&ocirc;ng ty cung c\u1ea5p cho kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng gi\u1ea3i ph&aacute;p v\u1eadn t\u1ea3i v&agrave; Song song v\u1edbi \u0111&oacute;, \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cung c\u1ea5p \u0111&uacute;ng nh\u01b0 \u0111&atilde; cam k\u1ebft v\u1edbi kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, C&ocirc;ng ty thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp quy tr&igrave;nh l&agrave;m vi\u1ec7c (Standard Operating Procedure &ndash; SOP) v\u1edbi m\u1ed7i kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3 h&oacute;a t\u1eebng b\u01b0\u1edbc c&ocirc;ng vi\u1ec7c v&agrave; th\u1eddi gian hai b&ecirc;n c\u1ea7n th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n.<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<\/p>","mota_en":"<p>The company provides customers with integrated, creative transportation and logistics solutions with full responsibility from arranging safe transportation for each package to other logistics services such as packaging, storage, and distribution.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>The company designs services according to each customer&#39;s requirements, suitable for each customer&#39;s specific products. C&ocirc;ng ty s\u1edf h\u1eefu \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 xe t\u1ea3i nh\u1ecf hung m\u1ea1nh v\u1edbi t\u1ea3i tr\u1ecdng t\u1eeb 0,5 t\u1ea5n, 1,25 t\u1ea5n, 2,3 t\u1ea5n, 5 t\u1ea5n, 8 t\u1ea5n, 10 t\u1ea5n v&agrave; \u0111\u1ebfn 15 t\u1ea5n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph&eacute;p ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng tr&ecirc;n t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c tuy\u1ebfn ph\u1ed1 t\u1ea1i b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m n&agrave;o trong ng&agrave;y (k\u1ec3 c\u1ea3 gi\u1edd cao \u0111i\u1ec3m) \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n t\u1ed1t c&aacute;c h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i to&agrave;n qu\u1ed1c.<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>Not only does it stop at providing transportation, delivery, and counting services for finished products of large manufacturers, the Company also connects and expands cooperation with these manufacturers in providing services. clear customs and transport input materials for them. s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t l\u1edbn, C&ocirc;ng ty c&ograve;n k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i, m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c v\u1edbi c&aacute;c nh&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t n&agrave;y trong vi\u1ec7c cung c\u1ea5p d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 khai thu&ecirc; h\u1ea3i quan v&agrave; v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u \u0111\u1ea7u v&agrave;o cho h\u1ecd. C&ocirc;ng ty s\u1edf h\u1eefu \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 xe t\u1ea3i nh\u1ecf hung m\u1ea1nh v\u1edbi t\u1ea3i tr\u1ecdng t\u1eeb 0,5 t\u1ea5n, 1,25 t\u1ea5n, 2,3 t\u1ea5n, 5 t\u1ea5n, 8 t\u1ea5n, 10 t\u1ea5n v&agrave; \u0111\u1ebfn 15 t\u1ea5n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph&eacute;p ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng tr&ecirc;n t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c tuy\u1ebfn ph\u1ed1 t\u1ea1i b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m n&agrave;o trong ng&agrave;y (k\u1ec3 c\u1ea3 gi\u1edd cao \u0111i\u1ec3m) \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n t\u1ed1t c&aacute;c h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i to&agrave;n qu\u1ed1c.<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<\/p>","mota_en":"<p>Not only does it stop at providing transportation, delivery, and counting services for finished products of large manufacturers, the Company also connects and expands cooperation with these manufacturers in providing services. clear customs and transport input materials for them. The company owns a strong fleet of small trucks with capacities ranging from 0.5 tons, 1.25 tons, 2.3 tons, 5 tons, 8 tons, 10 tons and up to 15 tons that are allowed to operate on all routes. streets at any time of the day (including rush hours) to ensure good implementation of nationwide distribution contracts.<\/p>","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p><br \/>\r\nC&ocirc;ng ty cung c\u1ea5p cho kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng gi\u1ea3i ph&aacute;p v\u1eadn t\u1ea3i v&agrave; logistics t\u1ed5ng h\u1ee3p, s&aacute;ng t\u1ea1o v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 tr&aacute;ch nhi\u1ec7m t\u1eeb vi\u1ec7c s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n an to&agrave;n cho t\u1eebng ki\u1ec7n h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ebfn d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 h\u1eadu c\u1ea7n kh&aacute;c nh\u01b0 \u0111&oacute;ng g&oacute;i, l\u01b0u kho, ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>C&ocirc;ng ty thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 theo \u0111&uacute;ng y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a t\u1eebng kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m \u0111\u1eb7c th&ugrave; c\u1ee7a m\u1ed7i kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng. Song song v\u1edbi \u0111&oacute;, \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cung c\u1ea5p \u0111&uacute;ng nh\u01b0 \u0111&atilde; cam k\u1ebft v\u1edbi kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, C&ocirc;ng ty thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp quy tr&igrave;nh l&agrave;m vi\u1ec7c (Standard Operating Procedure &ndash; SOP) v\u1edbi m\u1ed7i kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3 h&oacute;a t\u1eebng b\u01b0\u1edbc c&ocirc;ng vi\u1ec7c v&agrave; th\u1eddi gian hai b&ecirc;n c\u1ea7n th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n.<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>The company provides customers with integrated, creative transportation and logistics solutions with full responsibility from arranging safe transportation for each package to other logistics services such as packaging, storage, and distribution.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>The company designs services according to each customer&#39;s requirements, suitable for each customer&#39;s specific products. At the same time, to ensure that services are provided as committed to customers, the Company establishes a working process (Standard Operating Procedure - SOP) with each customer, specifying each step of work and the time both sides need to implement.<\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"dich-vu-van-tai-noi-dia-cp-372101718692755","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"3","icon":"images\/dtn\/9.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1718606455","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"6","step":"2","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4 V\u1eacN T\u1ea2I N\u1ed8I \u0110\u1ecaA","seo_title_en":"The service still loads domestically","seo_title_cn":"","seo_keywords_vi":"D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4 V\u1eacN T\u1ea2I N\u1ed8I \u0110\u1ecaA","seo_keywords_en":"The service still loads domestically","seo_keywords_cn":"","seo_description_vi":"D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4 V\u1eacN T\u1ea2I N\u1ed8I \u0110\u1ecaA","seo_description_en":"The service still loads domestically","seo_description_cn":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"1","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","gia_tri_1_vi":"","gia_tri_2_vi":"","gia_tri_3_vi":""},{"id":"194","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"D\u1ecbch vu khai thu\u1ebf h\u1ea3i quan","tenbaiviet_en":"Customs tax declaration service","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"<p>C&ocirc;ng ty cung c\u1ea5p cho kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng gi\u1ea3i ph&aacute;p v\u1eadn t\u1ea3i v&agrave; logistics t\u1ed5ng h\u1ee3p, s&aacute;ng t\u1ea1o v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 tr&aacute;ch nhi\u1ec7m t\u1eeb vi\u1ec7c s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n an to&agrave;n cho t\u1eebng ki\u1ec7n h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ebfn d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 h\u1eadu c\u1ea7n kh&aacute;c nh\u01b0 \u0111&oacute;ng g&oacute;i, l\u01b0u kho, ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>C&ocirc;ng ty thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 theo \u0111&uacute;ng y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a t\u1eebng kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m \u0111\u1eb7c th&ugrave; c\u1ee7a m\u1ed7i kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng. Song song v\u1edbi \u0111&oacute;, \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cung c\u1ea5p \u0111&uacute;ng nh\u01b0 \u0111&atilde; cam k\u1ebft v\u1edbi kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, C&ocirc;ng ty thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp quy tr&igrave;nh l&agrave;m vi\u1ec7c (Standard Operating Procedure &ndash; SOP) v\u1edbi m\u1ed7i kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3 h&oacute;a t\u1eebng b\u01b0\u1edbc c&ocirc;ng vi\u1ec7c v&agrave; th\u1eddi gian hai b&ecirc;n c\u1ea7n th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n.<\/p>","mota_en":"<p>The company provides customers with integrated, creative transportation and logistics solutions with full responsibility from arranging safe transportation for each package to other logistics services such as packaging, storage, and distribution.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>The company designs services according to each customer&#39;s requirements, suitable for each customer&#39;s specific products. At the same time, to ensure that services are provided as committed to customers, the Company establishes a working process (Standard Operating Procedure - SOP) with each customer, specifying each step of work and the time both sides need to implement.<\/p>","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p>Kh&ocirc;ng ch\u1ec9 d\u1eebng l\u1ea1i \u1edf vi\u1ec7c cung c\u1ea5p d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n, giao nh\u1eadn, ki\u1ec3m \u0111\u1ebfm c&aacute;c th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c nh&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t l\u1edbn, C&ocirc;ng ty c&ograve;n k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i, m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c v\u1edbi c&aacute;c nh&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t n&agrave;y trong vi\u1ec7c cung c\u1ea5p d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 khai thu&ecirc; h\u1ea3i quan v&agrave; v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u \u0111\u1ea7u v&agrave;o cho h\u1ecd. C&ocirc;ng ty s\u1edf h\u1eefu \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 xe t\u1ea3i nh\u1ecf hung m\u1ea1nh v\u1edbi t\u1ea3i tr\u1ecdng t\u1eeb 0,5 t\u1ea5n, 1,25 t\u1ea5n, 2,3 t\u1ea5n, 5 t\u1ea5n, 8 t\u1ea5n, 10 t\u1ea5n v&agrave; \u0111\u1ebfn 15 t\u1ea5n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph&eacute;p ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng tr&ecirc;n t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c tuy\u1ebfn ph\u1ed1 t\u1ea1i b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m n&agrave;o trong ng&agrave;y (k\u1ec3 c\u1ea3 gi\u1edd cao \u0111i\u1ec3m) \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n t\u1ed1t c&aacute;c h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i to&agrave;n qu\u1ed1c.<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>Not only does it stop at providing transportation, delivery, and counting services for finished products of large manufacturers, the Company also connects and expands cooperation with these manufacturers in providing services. clear customs and transport input materials for them. logistics t\u1ed5ng h\u1ee3p, s&aacute;ng t\u1ea1o v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 tr&aacute;ch nhi\u1ec7m t\u1eeb vi\u1ec7c s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n an to&agrave;n cho t\u1eebng ki\u1ec7n h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ebfn d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 h\u1eadu c\u1ea7n kh&aacute;c nh\u01b0 \u0111&oacute;ng g&oacute;i, l\u01b0u kho, ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>C&ocirc;ng ty thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 theo \u0111&uacute;ng y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a t\u1eebng kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, ph&ugrave; Song song v\u1edbi \u0111&oacute;, \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cung c\u1ea5p \u0111&uacute;ng nh\u01b0 \u0111&atilde; cam k\u1ebft v\u1edbi kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, C&ocirc;ng ty thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp quy tr&igrave;nh l&agrave;m vi\u1ec7c (Standard Operating Procedure &ndash; SOP) v\u1edbi m\u1ed7i kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3 h&oacute;a t\u1eebng b\u01b0\u1edbc c&ocirc;ng vi\u1ec7c v&agrave; th\u1eddi gian hai b&ecirc;n c\u1ea7n th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n.<\/p>","mota_en":"<p>The company provides customers with integrated, creative transportation and logistics solutions with full responsibility from arranging safe transportation for each package to other logistics services such as packaging, storage, and distribution.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>The company designs services according to each customer&#39;s requirements, suitable for each customer&#39;s specific products. At the same time, to ensure that services are provided as committed to customers, the Company establishes a working process (Standard Operating Procedure - SOP) with each customer, specifying each step of work and the time both sides need to implement.<\/p>","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p>Kh&ocirc;ng ch\u1ec9 d\u1eebng l\u1ea1i \u1edf vi\u1ec7c cung c\u1ea5p d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n, giao nh\u1eadn, ki\u1ec3m \u0111\u1ebfm c&aacute;c th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c nh&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t l\u1edbn, C&ocirc;ng ty c&ograve;n k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i, m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c v\u1edbi c&aacute;c nh&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t n&agrave;y trong vi\u1ec7c cung c\u1ea5p d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 khai thu&ecirc; h\u1ea3i quan v&agrave; v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u \u0111\u1ea7u v&agrave;o cho h\u1ecd. C&ocirc;ng ty s\u1edf h\u1eefu \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 xe t\u1ea3i nh\u1ecf hung m\u1ea1nh v\u1edbi t\u1ea3i tr\u1ecdng t\u1eeb 0,5 t\u1ea5n, 1,25 t\u1ea5n, 2,3 t\u1ea5n, 5 t\u1ea5n, 8 t\u1ea5n, 10 t\u1ea5n v&agrave; \u0111\u1ebfn 15 t\u1ea5n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph&eacute;p ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng tr&ecirc;n t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c tuy\u1ebfn ph\u1ed1 t\u1ea1i b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m n&agrave;o trong ng&agrave;y (k\u1ec3 c\u1ea3 gi\u1edd cao \u0111i\u1ec3m) \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n t\u1ed1t c&aacute;c h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i to&agrave;n qu\u1ed1c.<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>Not only does it stop at providing transportation, delivery, and counting services for finished products of large manufacturers, the Company also connects and expands cooperation with these manufacturers in providing services. clear customs and transport input materials for them. s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t l\u1edbn, C&ocirc;ng ty c&ograve;n k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i, m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c v\u1edbi c&aacute;c nh&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t n&agrave;y trong vi\u1ec7c cung c\u1ea5p d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 khai thu&ecirc; h\u1ea3i quan v&agrave; v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u \u0111\u1ea7u v&agrave;o cho h\u1ecd. C&ocirc;ng ty s\u1edf h\u1eefu \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 xe t\u1ea3i nh\u1ecf hung m\u1ea1nh v\u1edbi t\u1ea3i tr\u1ecdng t\u1eeb 0,5 t\u1ea5n, 1,25 t\u1ea5n, 2,3 t\u1ea5n, 5 t\u1ea5n, 8 t\u1ea5n, 10 t\u1ea5n v&agrave; \u0111\u1ebfn 15 t\u1ea5n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph&eacute;p ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng tr&ecirc;n t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c tuy\u1ebfn ph\u1ed1 t\u1ea1i b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m n&agrave;o trong ng&agrave;y (k\u1ec3 c\u1ea3 gi\u1edd cao \u0111i\u1ec3m) \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n t\u1ed1t c&aacute;c h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i to&agrave;n qu\u1ed1c.<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<\/p>","mota_en":"<p>Not only does it stop at providing transportation, delivery, and counting services for finished products of large manufacturers, the Company also connects and expands cooperation with these manufacturers in providing services. clear customs and transport input materials for them. The company owns a strong fleet of small trucks with capacities ranging from 0.5 tons, 1.25 tons, 2.3 tons, 5 tons, 8 tons, 10 tons and up to 15 tons that are allowed to operate on all routes. streets at any time of the day (including rush hours) to ensure good implementation of nationwide distribution contracts.<\/p>","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p><br \/>\r\nC&ocirc;ng ty cung c\u1ea5p cho kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng gi\u1ea3i ph&aacute;p v\u1eadn t\u1ea3i v&agrave; logistics t\u1ed5ng h\u1ee3p, s&aacute;ng t\u1ea1o v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 tr&aacute;ch nhi\u1ec7m t\u1eeb vi\u1ec7c s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n an to&agrave;n cho t\u1eebng ki\u1ec7n h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ebfn d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 h\u1eadu c\u1ea7n kh&aacute;c nh\u01b0 \u0111&oacute;ng g&oacute;i, l\u01b0u kho, ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>C&ocirc;ng ty thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 theo \u0111&uacute;ng y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a t\u1eebng kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m \u0111\u1eb7c th&ugrave; c\u1ee7a m\u1ed7i kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng. Song song v\u1edbi \u0111&oacute;, \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cung c\u1ea5p \u0111&uacute;ng nh\u01b0 \u0111&atilde; cam k\u1ebft v\u1edbi kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, C&ocirc;ng ty thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp quy tr&igrave;nh l&agrave;m vi\u1ec7c (Standard Operating Procedure &ndash; SOP) v\u1edbi m\u1ed7i kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3 h&oacute;a t\u1eebng b\u01b0\u1edbc c&ocirc;ng vi\u1ec7c v&agrave; th\u1eddi gian hai b&ecirc;n c\u1ea7n th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n.<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>The company provides customers with integrated, creative transportation and logistics solutions with full responsibility from arranging safe transportation for each package to other logistics services such as packaging, storage, and distribution.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>The company designs services according to each customer&#39;s requirements, suitable for each customer&#39;s specific products. At the same time, to ensure that services are provided as committed to customers, the Company establishes a working process (Standard Operating Procedure - SOP) with each customer, specifying each step of work and the time both sides need to implement.<\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"dich-vu-van-tai-noi-dia","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"2","icon":"images\/dtn\/7.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1718606191","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"6","step":"2","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4 V\u1eacN T\u1ea2I N\u1ed8I \u0110\u1ecaA","seo_title_en":"The service still loads domestically","seo_title_cn":"","seo_keywords_vi":"D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4 V\u1eacN T\u1ea2I N\u1ed8I \u0110\u1ecaA","seo_keywords_en":"The service still loads domestically","seo_keywords_cn":"","seo_description_vi":"D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4 V\u1eacN T\u1ea2I N\u1ed8I \u0110\u1ecaA","seo_description_en":"The service still loads domestically","seo_description_cn":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"1","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","gia_tri_1_vi":"","gia_tri_2_vi":"","gia_tri_3_vi":""},{"id":"191","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"D\u1ecbch V\u1ee5 Logistics","tenbaiviet_en":"Services of Logistics","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"<p>C&ocirc;ng ty cung c\u1ea5p cho kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng gi\u1ea3i ph&aacute;p v\u1eadn t\u1ea3i v&agrave; logistics t\u1ed5ng h\u1ee3p, s&aacute;ng t\u1ea1o v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 tr&aacute;ch nhi\u1ec7m t\u1eeb vi\u1ec7c s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n an to&agrave;n cho t\u1eebng ki\u1ec7n h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ebfn d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 h\u1eadu c\u1ea7n kh&aacute;c nh\u01b0 \u0111&oacute;ng g&oacute;i, l\u01b0u kho, ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>C&ocirc;ng ty thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 theo \u0111&uacute;ng y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a t\u1eebng kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m \u0111\u1eb7c th&ugrave; c\u1ee7a m\u1ed7i kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng. Song song v\u1edbi \u0111&oacute;, \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cung c\u1ea5p \u0111&uacute;ng nh\u01b0 \u0111&atilde; cam k\u1ebft v\u1edbi kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, C&ocirc;ng ty thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp quy tr&igrave;nh l&agrave;m vi\u1ec7c (Standard Operating Procedure &ndash; SOP) v\u1edbi m\u1ed7i kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3 h&oacute;a t\u1eebng b\u01b0\u1edbc c&ocirc;ng vi\u1ec7c v&agrave; th\u1eddi gian hai b&ecirc;n c\u1ea7n th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n.<\/p>","mota_en":"<p>The company provides customers with integrated, creative transportation and logistics solutions with full responsibility from arranging safe transportation for each package to other logistics services such as packaging, storage, and distribution.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>The company designs services according to each customer&#39;s requirements, suitable for each customer&#39;s specific products. At the same time, to ensure that services are provided as committed to customers, the Company establishes a working process (Standard Operating Procedure - SOP) with each customer, specifying each step of work and the time both sides need to implement.<\/p>","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p>Kh&ocirc;ng ch\u1ec9 d\u1eebng l\u1ea1i \u1edf vi\u1ec7c cung c\u1ea5p d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n, giao nh\u1eadn, ki\u1ec3m \u0111\u1ebfm c&aacute;c th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c nh&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t l\u1edbn, C&ocirc;ng ty c&ograve;n k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i, m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c v\u1edbi c&aacute;c nh&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t n&agrave;y trong vi\u1ec7c cung c\u1ea5p d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 khai thu&ecirc; h\u1ea3i quan v&agrave; v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u \u0111\u1ea7u v&agrave;o cho h\u1ecd. C&ocirc;ng ty s\u1edf h\u1eefu \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 xe t\u1ea3i nh\u1ecf hung m\u1ea1nh v\u1edbi t\u1ea3i tr\u1ecdng t\u1eeb 0,5 t\u1ea5n, 1,25 t\u1ea5n, 2,3 t\u1ea5n, 5 t\u1ea5n, 8 t\u1ea5n, 10 t\u1ea5n v&agrave; \u0111\u1ebfn 15 t\u1ea5n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph&eacute;p ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng tr&ecirc;n t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c tuy\u1ebfn ph\u1ed1 t\u1ea1i b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m n&agrave;o trong ng&agrave;y (k\u1ec3 c\u1ea3 gi\u1edd cao \u0111i\u1ec3m) \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n t\u1ed1t c&aacute;c h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i to&agrave;n qu\u1ed1c.<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>Not only does it stop at providing transportation, delivery, and counting services for finished products of large manufacturers, the Company also connects and expands cooperation with these manufacturers in providing services. clear customs and transport input materials for them. The company owns a strong fleet of small trucks with capacities ranging from 0.5 tons, 1.25 tons, 2.3 tons, 5 tons, 8 tons, 10 tons and up to 15 tons that are allowed to operate on all routes. streets at any time of the day (including rush hours) to ensure good implementation of nationwide distribution contracts.<\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"dich-vu-logistics","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"1","icon":"images\/dtn\/7.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1718346900","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"9","step":"2","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"D\u1ecbch V\u1ee5 Logistics","seo_title_en":"Services of Logistics","seo_title_cn":"","seo_keywords_vi":"D\u1ecbch V\u1ee5 Logistics","seo_keywords_en":"Services of Logistics","seo_keywords_cn":"","seo_description_vi":"D\u1ecbch V\u1ee5 Logistics","seo_description_en":"Services of Logistics","seo_description_cn":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"1","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","gia_tri_1_vi":"","gia_tri_2_vi":"","gia_tri_3_vi":""}]
